description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an PWE3 SATop is crossed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdCrossingAlert F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdInterval i 1 F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdValueLo u 9999 F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdValueHi u 9999 F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
variables.name: F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
variables.name: F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-PWE3-MIB::f3Pwe3SatopThresholdValueHi
